answers.answer: sometimes the suppliers themselves can help. http://www.pparx.org/ might help. and diall 211 in your area, they will have local info.

I changed pumps a while ago and have some accu-chek supplies I cannot  use.  I've been wishing I knew someone who could use them.

question: I am have financial problems and my parents have been helping out as much as they can. I have had diabetes for 44 years and have been on an insulin pump for about8 yrs. Does anyone know where to go for assistance with supplies.
title: insulin pump supplies
